testsuite.system-out: @smokeTest Scenario: Correct error message is provided when searching for an order that does not exist ?[90m# OrderTests.feature:5?[0m ?[32mGiven ?[0m?[32mthe Swagger Petstore API is available?[0m ?[90m# CommonDefinitions.the_swagger_petstore_api_is_available()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI search for an order with an id value of '?[0m?[32m?[1m15787678?[0m?[32m'?[0m ?[90m# OrderEndpointStepDefinitions.i_search_for_an_order_with_an_id_value_of_id(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe requests response will contain the value '?[0m?[32m?[1mOrder not found?[0m?[32m' for the '?[0m?[32m?[1mmessage?[0m?[32m' field?[0m ?[90m# CommonDefinitions.i_will_be_able_to_run_connected_step_definitions(String,String)?[0m
